name: scheduling_exec
label: Scripts & Agendamentos
description: Gerenciador de Scripts Personalizados e Agendamentos
content-security-policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://unpkg.com; font-src 'self' data: https://unpkg.com; img-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self'
